title: Geoff Culbert - Business Council of Australia
snippet: Geoff assumed the role of President of the Business Council of Australia in February 2024. Geoff is Chair of the NSW Fundraising Committee for the Australian Olympic Committee.

title: Geoff Culbert to lead the BCA Board - Business Council of Australia
snippet: The Business Council of Australia is pleased to announce Geoff Culbert will succeed Tim Reed as the next BCA president.

title: Business Council of Australia President Geoff Culbert Annual Dinner address 2025 - Business Council of Australia
snippet: Geoff Allen, who was the BCA’s first CEO back in 1983.

title: Business Council of Australia - Wikipedia
snippet: President: Geoff Culbert - Chair of the NSW Fundraising Committee for the Australian Olympic Committee

title: New BCA President starts today - Business Council of Australia
snippet: BCA Chief Executive Bran Black welcomed Mr Culbert to the BCA and paid tribute to outgoing President Tim Reed. “Australian business is fortunate to have someone of Geoff’s calibre as BCA President.
